content: Great adaptation to an already great game!
This is definitely a five-star game! Possibly the best board game port on the Play Store!
The game freezes sometimes. It tells you to take an action after you have taken both and will not let you go any further. You have to quit the game.
replyContent: We have a new update again and even more enhanced ram usage. Hope you will give it a try. Especially against the AI it will be way more stable. Cheers

content: Please fix the online. You select an online game but doesn't let you choose how many to play against. Games against computer work fine
replyContent: Hello, we have 2 online modes. Friendly games against your friends (choose how many players / choose standard or altenative maps. All the same or random for each). Then there is a ranked online mode that is fixed on 3 players/same random map.

content: Fantastic job!

Good implementation of the boardgame but with minority fail. The description for each yellow and beige tile should be made easy to display (dont use touchhold, use i when click the i it displays the description). And there is no online realtime game mode make the app got 3 star only from me. I need to challenge online gamer. Not play and pass. Even the hardest AI is easy to beat.
replyContent: Hello,... longpress is set to 2 sec. Alternatively press the question mark on the left side of the circle... it displays the tile glossary. Realtime gaming is of course possible. Just look for players that want to stay online for at least a whole game. We do have a fast queue ranking also, but most player play in their break. Function does exist.

content: The game looks gorgeous and the fact that the game is able to be played on a cell phone screen is great. My tablet cannot handle the animations and transitions. It runs very slow. Not really the developers fault, but just know on older equipment it can lag and shut down. On my Samsung 3 Chromebook, it ran for a a few rounds and then crashed. The game was not saved. On my Android One phone, it works well so far. I think for the price, it should be able to run smoothly on my devices.

I love the analog version.. The digital version is also good, the UI/UX are good and simple for people to undeestand. The graphics are great, though I found them to unnecessary over done, which kinda different from the analog version. One gripe is that you cannot check the tile description without getting into the description list. Playing random game online with stranger is pain and mostly unfinished waiting for other players' turns.
First time playing and almost won! Works well. It would be nice for individual volume control for fx and music.
Buggy. Crashes frequently

Castles of Burgandy App crashes during play. Even the Refresh Button freezes up. Tags: Waste, Of, Money, Google, Play, Too Much Detail On Graphics, RAM, YouTube, Reddit, Facebook, Censorship, Communist, Unamerican
Good implementation of the board game. Online multiplayer is smooth. Having a lot of fun with it!

Great game but minus two stars as people resign from online games and it doesn't count on your record. I've played 20 games with only one completing to the end. The other 19 games have resulted in someone forfeiting when I was ahead. Very frustrating!!!!
Neat game! Very poor online implementation. User interface is confusing. No usable description of past turns is available.
Great game but frequently freezes on extra action from castle.

The board layout is so confusing, I've played CoB for years and I cannot for the life of me figure out where my resources are or what is what and what things are going on. Whose dumb idea was it to revamp the entire board so it looks nothing like the game. Can't tell whose goods are whose, who has workers, can't see what goods are in any of the ports, everything is clunky, nothing makes sense. Mad I payed $10 for this. Should have gone to yucata to play.

This game freezes A LOT. I have to exit the game multiple times a round, as both mine and my opponent's screen says "waiting for opponent". It is very frustrating, especially considering the price. I love the concept of the game, and I like the board game version, but this app needs work.
Great game!

great game, it's just like the original board game, two things I do not like. I can't seem to find a person who is willing to play a quick game. the normal asnyc game is just too bloody long. Some of the scoring that is done at the end of the game is done directly in the app, making the game less thriling on the last round when someone is leading ahead
This is an excellent implementation of the board game! Another great app from Digidiced!
Amazing game. Takes a bit of getting used to, but great implementation of the board game.
Great
Love this game!!!
my only complaint is that the hardest ai is pretty weak
Awkward interface with tons of needless bells and whistles. Amazing how they managed to make such a great game so much less enjoyable.

Really great game. I'd never played before and learned how from the tutorial. The AI is only so-so and after a few days I could beat it consistently. But online games work well and are fun. Only complaint is that the animations are slow and tedious. It's cool the first time you see it. After that it's just annoying.

CoB is one of my favorite board games. This mobile adapation is great and has potential to be better. Some things need tweaking and optimization. 1) The game is battery hog and needs to be optimized to use less power. 2) I want to see my opponents online status (green if they're in active in our game, or red if they're not). 3) Turn history would be nice to have. I pay close attention to what my opponent does and it isn't always clear what move they made, so a text log of what happened would be helpful. The lag time on an online game can sometimes be annoying. If I leave the game open and my opponent takes their turn, it can takes ages for my app to switch to their board and show me what their move. The map rotation tool is finicky and doesn't work well.  Complaint about the games against the AI: I feel like my rolls are ALWAYS set to something I don't need. I know that it could just be bad luck, but when I play against the level 3 opponent, I end up using so many actions to get workers because I never get a roll that I need. It may be a conspiracy theory of mine, but I really feel like the computer sets my roll values and they're not truly random. HIDE THE SCORES UNTIL THE END!

i had a great experience with the AI in the standard board. the -2 stars are for the option to have alternative board, that does not work. i cannot click anywhere to play with any of the map options. Had great time at first but now that i want something more, that major bug disappointed me... ps i have sent the bug report twice the previous week

Excellent implementation of a great board game. The UI is smooth and intuitive. I especially appreciate that it is easy to keep multiple games going and easy to track progress in each. There is an issue with occasional loss of server connection which requires restarting the app. I'm sure the developers are working on it. Overall this is a great app and possibly the first boardgame app that I actually prefer over the cardboard version (much faster setup). Try it. I think you will like it.
Great app of an even greater game.
Great game! Unfortunately I get an error message when trying to log in with my Google account.
Lost friends list, can't add new ones.
Plays well and is a good game. There seems to be a bug in the way the trade cards are dealt out, as sometimes one or more seem to vanish leaving gaps.

ok, it's not terrible or unplayable, but there are some major problems. it is way too slow with all the loading times. COB works great for asynchronous play but if you revisit the app after 30 minutes to play your turn we're met with awful loading screens that can take 10-20 seconds and THEN you have to slog through all the animations on opponent turns. changing to the fastest speed doesn't hardly help, we need instantaneous speeds especially for when playing on the go.
Love the game but the interface is so bad its almost unplayable.

one of my favorite games (we have the regular board game and the card game as well) but a glitch I've found in both the iPhone and Android versions of the app will not allow you to use your free action from placing a castle to take a silver mine from the board.

great translation of this classic bg into mobile. two biggest complaints I have are pvp matches are 3 players only and everyone has the same map. can you please update to allow 4 player and allow us to choose different maps???
Great game and love the abilitt to play on the go or on my computer with the Steam version.
Unable to connect to Google Play account. Once this is fixed, I'll happily re-purchase and review. The game design and controls are great.

I was so excited to get this app. It's one of my favorite board games. However, the game crashes constantly. I haven't been able to actually complete a single game. Very disappointing waste of my money.
The game lags so much
It's playable again, mostly.  Achievements still don't work.  Stats don't work.  The UI is still awful but at least it's playable.
Game is great but it must be unoptimised or something as it makes my phone get real hot and drains my battery so fast! it loses two stars for this as it makes it almost unplayable.
i cant play the games. it requires me to update the client to play online ...
I literally bought this game today, and haven't been able to complete one game due to "network error". Terrible first impression. I'll be requesting a refund.

When I first got this game, it was fun and easy to use. In my mind, a solid 4 stars due to the high battery usage and the over-the-top animation when I'm perfectly content with just a static board. However, just today I am unable to play the game due to connectivity issues which forces me out of all local games I play. When i am directed to the main screen, it tells me to update my client for it to work properly. I then check for updates and it seems I have the current version. Please fix!
a LOT of NETWORK ERROR! I do a move and throw "network error", the button "reconect" don't work. Data consumption is huge (may because I needed to restart app after every single move)
replyContent: We just uploaded a fix for this. Sadly it only affects some users and our testers were unaffected. Version 5 adresses this issue.

content: I own the steam version and planned on merging the accounts from the credits page, but I can't login with Play Games without the app closing. If I tried to merge it said it can't find the Auth code. It gives me the Auth code now but if I enter all the information in the merge URL it gives me an error. The app is great on steam I hope they solve this soon for those of us affected.

The app is my first exposure to this game and I have quickly become addicted.  The presentation of this game is remarkable and it plays like a dream on both my phone and tablet.  Easily my new favorite game.
Excellent adaptation of this great board game.

I was a bit worried that a game with so much info on every tile wouldn't work well on a phone but this is quite well done. A great translation of one of my favourite games. The art looks great - nicely updated without straying too far from the original.
Online doesn't work at all

This app is just what I was looking for. I love the board game but don't get to play often enough. The presentation is great, I don't think the graphics are a distraction. I love that you can double tap any tile to find out what it does, this is a huge step up over flipping through the manual. I haven't tried online yet, but offline is great so far. Minus one star for being a battery hog. About 30% an hour on my new Pixel 2. Hopefully something they'll look into for the next update.
Battery optimization is much better in the new version. Great game.
Genuinely one of the worst UIs I've ever seen

The game in the app itself is very good. The AI is decent enough - if you're an experienced player you'll likely be able to win pretty consistently, but they are competitive enough to keep it interesting, and let's be honest - CoB is such a great game that the ability to play it anytime you want is a win.
Cannot play online. The game cannot connect to Google Play and keeps giving me a "Could not get authcode." error even after updating Google Play Games and clearing the cache and data for it.
very nice!
A great digital version of a great game. It does seem to be a battery hog, though. Also, I'm getting the "no internet connection" error on my OnePlus 6T, but I'm sure they'll have that fixed soon.
replyContent: We just uploaded a fix for this. Sadly it only affects some users and our testers were unaffected. Version 5 adresses this issue.

content: Overall, the rules and gameplay seem accurate. However, power consumption is quite bad. Needs an option to just view my own board. The constant switching of boards is jarring as you're working on a thought. I'm less interested in fancy animations than good battery usage.
I bought this app to play Online and receive a "You have no Internet connection" whenever I try to do anything.
replyContent: We just uploaded a fix for this. Sadly it only affects some users and our testers were unaffected. Version 5 adresses this issue.

content: Plays and feels just like the boardgame but is a massive power hog. Drained 25% of my phone battery in 30 minutes. Game also crashes if a player times outin a quick ranked game.
